body_html:
Thanks @beanieboi !

Are you sure this solves the auto-logout issue? I was thinking that a session cookie does not expire at all as long as there is no expires_after key. I was thinking that we devise is responsible for the overly early timeout.

body:
Thanks @beanieboi !

Are you sure this solves the auto-logout issue? I was thinking that a session cookie does not expire at all as long as there is no `expires_after` key. I was thinking that we devise is responsible for the overly early timeout.
